TopicTitle: [ANSWERED] How to change text color and insert special symbols?

Articles.Content:
There definitely must be the way to change text color and insert a science or a funds symbols into a plain text, e.g. how it is done in research nodes tooltips. I'm almost sure that it is not a texture but a some special symbol that is treated by the KSP font as a science sign. As for the text color, it should be changed with some #ff00ff pattern but I can't figure out how to enable it ( and  tags do not work).

Does anyone know a way to do it or a mod that alters the text of tooltips using color and special symbols?
